original_text: Early the next morning Abimelek summoned all his officials, and when he told them all that had happened, they were very much afraid.
korean_text: 아비멜렉이 그 날 아침에 일찍이 일어나 모든 종들을 불러 그 모든 일을 말하여 들려 주니 그들이 심히 두려워하였더라

sentences.original_text: and when he told them all that had happened
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그가 일어난 모든 일을 그들에게 말했을 때
